thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Johnny Weir Absolutely Loves the Word Absolutely

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Johnny Weir Absolutely Loves the Word Absolutely
text:
By the time Johnny Weir called Yuzuru Hanyu’s short program “liquid silk” it was clear—we had to study Johnny’s jargon.
Ahead of the women’s free skate on Friday morning in Pyeongchang, the figure skating at these Olympics has been a frozen roller coaster. This year’s quad jumps make triples look like they’re from the ice age. American gold-medal hopeful Nathan Chen flopped. Hanyu dazzled to become the first men’s back-to-back gold medalist in more than half a century.
...
